phrases: But only if you go out with me, Kazuya-kun!
And on Mizuhara's orders, I found myself dating her on a provisional basis.
Meanwhile, I stopped seeing Mizuhara completely,
and the frosty winter began to set in.
When hwill hhyou hhhget hhhhhere hhhhh?
When hwill hhyou hhhget hhhhhere hhhhh?
If you do not hurry up
I will charge you for an extension
Who does that girl think she is?
And that stupid virgin's pissing hme off, too!
Not like they will last more than three months, anyway

Receipt Kinoshita Kazuya-sama Rent-A-Girlfriend Itemized Bill Base Fee/hrhhhhhh 5000 yen x1 hChoice Fee (Rookie)hhhhhhhhh5000 yen x1 hhCosts (City Limits)hhhhhhhhhhhh2000 yen x1 Total: 12,000 yen + taxes
The terms: two phone calls per day, no leaving her on read,
This gives me no bragging rights,
plus it comes with the fear of having my fake relationship with Mizuhara exposed!
Did I make a deal with the devil?!
No girlfriend could be this scary!
And after all that talk about how important love is,
how could Mizuhara tell me to go out with her?!
I guess I was just a client in her eyes after all.
What the hell is wrong with me?
I need to find some way to distance myself from Ruka-chan.
Right now, my college life is on a one-way trip to nowhere.
Did you see the season premiere of Terrace House?
It made me wonder just how many Japanese really want to be a model.
Well, you would not contact me, so I decided to take matters into my own hands.
Man, if Kuri happened to see this...
Let us try not to let Kuribayashi find out!
Surely you understand that showing up on campus is bad news!
But I do not think we can keep this hidden forever.
Besides, I was just a rental girlfriend.
Who knows if he even liked me for real?
I am the one who said I was okay with a trial.
It is not like I want to put you on the spot, so I will stay away.
Want To go catch a movie this Saturday?
All couples grow closer in winter!
It is the season for us!
I-I guess I could do a movie.
At least there will be an armrest between us.
Hey, could you stop clinging to me?
Please, I know you love it.
We are thinking of having a pajama party for Christmas, the three of us.
We are used to you being secretive.
But do let us know if you have good news!
What is the plan for Christmas?
I would like to go see some night lights!
I am going on a trip with family over Christmas.
This cannot go on all the way to Christmas, or she will really get the wrong idea!
I am breaking up with you.
I am breaking up with you.
Last year, I spent the entire time at home studying for entrance exams.
Use it to buy a GAO porn lucky bag, VGB.
were these nonsense texts from Kibe.
If only I could spend Christmas with Mizuhara...
If I make a booking right now, I
She is already booked for Christmas Eve?
And I guess great minds think alike.
She is on top of the charts among rookies, after all.
Why is she even working as a rental girlfriend?
But she said she was not making all that much,
and she is living in this run-down building.
She is not the type to get off on wrapping boys around her finger, either.
Well, no point in thinking about it.
No way I could figure it out...
Man, looks like I will be spending another Christmas alone...
That is all the end-of-year payments done...
Lots of it went to Mizuhara.
It is my own fault, though.
Guess I will have to find a job for real.
Look at her all dressed up!
I did not want to see her working!
But I have a feeling I should not look...
I cannot believe a hottie like that is booking a rental girlfriend, though.
I did not know why, but a massive doubt crept into my mind at that moment...
An all-too-cruel possibility I would stumbled upon on that sacred day.
Something I wanted to look away from'because it would turn my world upside-down.
At the same time, I was dismayed at myself for not even considering it until then.
Maybe Rental Girlfriend Mizuhara Chizuru has a boyfriend.
It took but a few seconds for those dark thoughts to completely consume my mind.
Why did the thought never even cross my mind?
Who ever said a rental girlfriend could not have a boyfriend?
Come to think of it, I know nothing about Mizuhara's personal life.
And there is a chance they are dating in secret.
And Mizuhara being single was about as likely as pigs flying to begin with!
Sorry, I lied about when my last train leaves.
Santa will not come see you this year.
What did you do over the weekend, Umi-kun?
I want to try it, too!
I will call you next time I go.
If Mizuhara saw me, what would she think?
Is that seriously her boyfriend, though?
There is still a chance he is renting her.
And it would be mighty deceptive of her to act all affable with clients
while dating a pretty boy in real life...
If I am going to date a guy, he is got to be hot.
Would Mizuhara really betray us like that?
That would be way too cruel!
Being that pretty is not an excuse!
I need to do this for the bros!
What a trite idea for a date.
What is he, some well-adjusted fellow?
Why would anyone pay to rent her and just watch a movie for two hours, though?
It is really unlikely that this is a rental date, I guess?
Knows a thing or two about rental dates
I cannot just stand around here!
Now Showing The Redemption of a Twenty-Year-Old
That was too deep for me.
Who even was the culprit in the end?
Does she watch stuff like that all the time?
It was one long cut, and the tension was palpable!
I hear the director insisted on doing it that way.
I would love to see it one more time!
They are having a jolly good time!
They are on the same wavelength!
Wow, she says it is perfect!
Hey, what do you think of this one?
They are buying gifts for each other?
I have never seen her with such a happy smile...
I would love to have that someday.
They are, like, the ideal couple.
Seriously, what is going on here?!
Has taken more damage than he can handle
I have not seen them hold hands yet.
A lovey-dovey couple does not need to hold hands.
I told you to write what you want to eat on the whiteboard out front, did not I?
Sorry, it was a busy morning.
There you go again, all about work all the time.
You can eat your meeting minutes for dinner.
I do not think they would be very filling.
I bet I will start craving stew late at night.
Then I will make some and wait for you.
She is spending the night at his place?
I have seen and heard more than enough.
Hurts more than usual this year.
Well, duh, of course she would have a boyfriend, even if she works as a rental girlfriend.
I followed them all day like a creep.
If they would found out, I would have been taken to court.
Who do you think you are?
I want nothing to do with you!
Oh, man, the self-hatred's hitting hard.
I am calling about the thing we discussed.
Oh, he is here to make a call.
She is extremely beautiful, and just as wonderful on the inside.
She is satisfaction guaranteed for whoever sees her.
Does he know about her job?
But he is sounding awfully aloof about it...
I will check her measurements later and text you.
This is not about her job!
What the hell has he been talking about?
Mizuhara would not be fooled like that.
But she is too nice for her own good...
Maybe he took advantage of that?
Also, she is learned to let out some very alluring voices recently.
Damn it, I do not know how to go out there!
What right do I have to poke my nose in their business?
But there is no doubt he is a scumbag.
She is learned to let out some alluring voices, my ass!
I will not let that guy have his way with our Mizuhara!
W-Were not you about to kiss just now?
Why would Umi-kun and I kiss?
He was just about to fix up my earring.
You were not going to kiss?
A-Anyway, he is a scumbag trying to take you, his girlfriend, for a ride!
Uh, w-well, he goes to my college.
I-If he is not your boyfriend, then what?!
Why else would you be on a date with such a pretty boy on Christmas Eve, of all days?!
And you were talking about late-night stew and whatnot!
Are you talking about the script?
Oh, was I not supposed to mention that?
Or, well, I am just starting out.
I work that job because acting school costs money, and it serves as good practice.
Umi-kun is in that school with me.
I just had him help me with the script reading assigned to us while shopping.
I need to head over to the shoot.
Oh, sorry about all this, Umi-kun.
What was that phone call in the restroom all about, then?
You were talking about Mizuhara's voice and stuff.
Oh, gosh, you heard all that?
I was just recommending Chizuru-chan to a director I know.
I am glad it was not a big deal.
Sheesh, you are such a moron.
Did not you stop to consider you might be jumping to conclusions?
How long were you following us, anyway?
Since I spotted you at the station...
Do not you have anything better to do in life?
I was convinced you two were dating, and I did not want to bother you on your date.
But when I started thinking you might be getting tricked by a scumbag, I...
I just could not ignore it.
I would understand if you never wanted to see my face again.
Honestly, who do I think I am?
She really does live in a completely different world.
YOU-Umi-kun only had free time today.
And I figured I needed a guy's opinion if I was picking something out for a guy.
I-I mean, you have been using your broken phone without a case.
Th-That said, our secret belongs to both of us.
And I feel bad that I left you to deal with the Ruka-chan issue alone.
I-It is not a gift or anything, okay?
Just a token of my apology.
H-Hey, what are you crying for?!
I told you, it is not a gift or anything!
This is the first time a girl's ever given me anything on Christmas.
I have always been a hopelessly moronic loser...
my life is starting to take on new color.
You are taking anything but the subway back home.
Already a chief at her young age
I need your help with homework!
I know you have a ton of movies on DVD.
What kind of movies do you like?
The ones I saw in his place were, like,
Magic Mirror Something or Stop Time and Something.
On the next episode of Rent-a-Girlfriend!
